nodes.text: The Ubiqtorate was one of several organizations established by the Galactic Empire following the transition from the Galactic Republic when the four heads of the intelligence agencies combined their forces to prevent corruption from senators, and unified into the Ubiqtorate, which was the leadership of Imperial Intelligence. Its headquarters were located in the COMPNOR arcology, which also housed the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order. Five years after the conclusion of the Clone Wars, Harus Ison, then Deputy Director of the Imperial Security Bureau, was promoted and moved into the Ubiqtorate.
